scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:production && npm run clean:editor && npm run clean:patterns && npm run clean:parts && npm run clean:templates
scripts.patterns:push: THEME=$(basename $(pwd)) && cd ../../.. && wp html:blocks src/patterns --all && wp pattern push --all && rm -f wp-content/themes/$THEME/patterns/*.html
scripts.page:pull: THEME=$(basename $(pwd)) && cd ../../.. && wp page pull --all && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME && npx prettier --write "src/content/pages/**/*.html"

name: broke-theme
description: A modern WordPress block theme boilerplate built with Tailwind CSS v4, Universal Block, and Timber. Features bidirectional content sync, html2pattern CLI, clean MVC architecture, and zero JavaScript dependencies by default.
author: Daniel Snell <daniel@broke.dev>
